website_summaries.verdict: Whether you’re nursing an injury or trying to get cozy on a chilly night, this extra-sturdy hot water bottle will stay warm for hours, and its fuzzy bear cover is a charming touch.
pros: Stays toasty for 3-4 hours indoors or 6-8 hours under bed covers
cons: Kids and pets should be supervised when using this model

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have had my hot water bottle for a few weeks now and I love it. It's soft and cuddly, no smell like I read on other reviews, no issues that I've noticed. It's my new favorite pain reliever.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Practical and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. When my old hot water bottle broke, I looked for a replacement and I found this bottle with the teddy bear cover. The bottle is classic and seems sturdy. The teddy bear cover is just as cute as the pictures seem, and it works well to both protect you from being burned by direct contact with the bottle, and helps it retain heat longer (I put this at the foot of my bed to warm it up before I get in during the winter). Great purchase, and it’s nice that the cover can be reused when the bottle eventually breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Bad stitch work,  but the water bottle is good
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product. If the quality of the stitching on the product weren't so shoddy, I would gladly have given it 5 stars, but it was broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and soft. I got it for my grieving cat who lost his brother recently and it helps to have a warm creature to sleep with.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: More Cute than Practical
customer_reviews.text: The hot bottle is a great size, and the cover fits well too. However, both the hot bottle and the cover arrived and have very strong rubber smells. This has not occurred with other brands I've bought before. The twist on cap for the hot bottle also does not look to have the best quality. The bear cover really is cute though! Gave this to my boyfriend for Valentine's day since he is always cold in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYERS BEWARE. The cap breaks during the second use and it almost burned my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, soft, and squishy! I bought this for when I have period cramps; I get really horrific period cramps and someone suggested that a hot water bottle might be helpful! So I looked up hot water bottles, found this one, and had to get it! It's even cuter than advertised on Amazon-it's the perfect size, and super adorable! This will definitely come in handy for when I'm not feeling well!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylen Sanders

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: THE STOPPER HAS FELL APART AFTER ONE TIME USE! NEVER PURCHASING FROM THIS VENDOR AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Fakinwa1

customer_reviews.title: The main application will not leak
customer_reviews.text: I received a broken one, it will leak, so disappointed, I won't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Mingwenliu

customer_reviews.title: Cute and work well
customer_reviews.text: I love how cute and soft the bear is, not only this, the hot water that I put is warm for a long time, I think it warm for over night because when I pull the water out in the morning it still lukewarm, it is help me alot during my menstruated cycle, reduce a lot of my back and belly pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The purple hot water bottle fits perfectly. It's sturdy. The bear is soft and comfy. Makes curling up with a hot water bottle easier! I just wish the head was 'floppier' and not firm.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaG

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea ... Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I purchased as a gift for someone who loves "Bart The Bear". She is ill and loves to cuddle up to her warm bear. The hot water bottle is the flexible kind and is not too large.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: You need this! Everyone needs one of these!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE my hot water bottle teddy bear! This product had saved me this winter. I use it to warm up. I put it in my bed, under my covers to warm my bed, I use it for my back pain, cramps, and even my kids LOVE it!! This item is a must have for EVERYONE. something so simple and so satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: it is super soft, very cute and my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute hot water bottle and cover. Bought as christmas gift for my 3 year old daughter and she is very attached. Quality of the bear cover appeared ok at first- but stitching in back seam where head attaches to body is shoddy and rapidly unraveling, after less than a week. Don't want to return it because she is so attached, so, I'll have to sew it myself. That aside, it is super soft, very cute and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value works as described
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good value you can feel the heat right through the teddy bear
customer_reviews.author: youngrck0616

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and sooo cute!! I didn't have any issues with poor stitching like some of the reviews mention, I checked the whole thing over and everything is high quality. Best $20 I've spent in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin King

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo cute! I got it for my niece as a gift and everyone in the family loved it. It is well made and looks great in person. I will definitely get more for other members of my family.
customer_reviews.author: Selin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Looks much better than the picture. Cute stuffed animal. Bought the bear and a panda. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jamjan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Better than pictured. So soft. And so warm when filled. I bought this for my bengal kitten and I think he is going to love sleeping with it! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot live without my hot water bottles. I have very cold feet and I literally walk around the house with it. It sad but I have gotten use to having it in my bed. It's not my fulltime bed companion :), The water stay fairly warm all throughout the night.
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Teddy Bear water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson, he gets a lot of tummy aches. He just loves it. Easy to use and very cozy. Bigger than expected. Very pleased would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The soft bear with the water bottle has had two holes pop up in him in just one week. One hole was at the edge of his smile and the other by his neck. I am starting to think that the quality of the bear is low. Also, the fabric next to the velcro sticks to the velcro and is getting ruined as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Biggerstaff

customer_reviews.title: It's not hot enough for me
customer_reviews.text: It's soft and very cuddly but the hot water bottle is just not hot enough for me. I suffer very bad menstrual cramps due to uterine fibroids. The water bottle just doesn't get hot enough to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Hot water bottle with a huggable animal cover
customer_reviews.text: I love the hot water bottle with the cute cover, which is very huggable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: suesu

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for my wife, she loves it and uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Warm you up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased it for me as a Christmas present. After using it to keep me warm every single night in a month, I decided to purchase one more. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Katie Tran

customer_reviews.title: My favourite. It holds the hot water so well that ...
customer_reviews.text: My favourite. It holds the hot water so well that I can sleep with it and it will still be warm in the morning. The soft bear cover makes it really nice to hold.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of stitching
customer_reviews.text: Love the product itself. Got the teddy and outs all fluffy and soft but the quality of the stitching is really bad. Had it for 3 days and had to redo all the stitching around the neck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Total Bear Hug
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected. It is the 2L which is the larger size. The bear is really cute and could be a regular stuffy on the bed--with added hot water bottle benefit.
customer_reviews.author: bitbox

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy. I fill him up with boiling hot water from the kettle and place him at the bottom of my bed underneath my covers. He is my solution for my perpetually cold as ice feet during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: my cat and i love it.
customer_reviews.text: i love it. helps during pms and cold nights... super nice to cuddle with, my kitten also loves it as well <3
customer_reviews.author: Sydnie mcalister

customer_reviews.title: I love this little bear
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bear! It's an amazing hot water bottle but also a cute toy, and he is so soft and fluffy!
customer_reviews.author: Denisova Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: I can carry it to work/church, anywhere without anyone noticing that it's a bottle. It was worth my purchase. Good and comfortable disguise
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripping apart after only days of use
customer_reviews.text: The cover is cute but I’ve been using it for only a few days and the stitching of the bears head has started to come off with the cotton mesh coming through. Such a shame for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its good for kids, a bit bulky, but my daugter likes it for growing pains
customer_reviews.author: parissa38

customer_reviews.title: Bad stiching
customer_reviews.text: Just opened my package and the stiching at the bears neck is very poor, the head is coming off. Very much disappointed with that. But the bottle itself is good.
customer_reviews.author: Marita

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an present for a little girl. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Katharina Told

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, and everyone in my family wants one now!
customer_reviews.author: a24la

customer_reviews.title: Stays Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It stays warm all night with hot tap water.
customer_reviews.author: Annett N.

customer_reviews.title: So cute and useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this heating pad. Definitely a worthwhile purchase and so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: But fun, and functional nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: I just wish it was a little bigger. But fun, and functional nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia B Senechal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made - my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie H.

customer_reviews.title: I really like it.
customer_reviews.text: this bag is really with high quality. the bear is cute and it feels fluffy andsoft. most important is it can keep warm all the night. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Xuewen H.

customer_reviews.title: Helps Baby with Gas
customer_reviews.text: We got this to help my son with gas. After eating, I place the hot water bottle on my chest and my son lays on top of it. Very helpful and love that the cover is a soft teddy bear.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Acius

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. It is very sturdy and the water stays hot all night.
customer_reviews.author: JetsetNatural

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and cozy, not top quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this, kids love it. But the quality of the cover is not up to par. The velcro rips the fabric on the inside if you're not very careful when you open it, the limbs have also come apart very easily.
customer_reviews.author: TwinsItIs

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and it does its job. It seems well made but I have only had it a few days. So far I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I use it for back pain and period cramps and it is so cute and cozy. Don’t know how durable it is yet, but so far I love.
customer_reviews.author: IR

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! Super cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Super cute and soft. It's becoming my new favorite winter gear. My cat loves it too. He sleeps on it every night! I liked it so much so I'm buying another one for my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Every member of the family had one and they kept us warm in our sleeping bags all night.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Cuddly and Warm
customer_reviews.text: It's the size of a toy Teddy and plush. The bears head covers the top of the water bottle so it is soft to cuddle. Nice for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to keep a young puppy warm after leaving the litter. It works fine. Doesn't leak. Not much more needed to say.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and it gets nice and hot. I’ve used it twice so far without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey P.

customer_reviews.title: Will keep you warm
customer_reviews.text: Stays hot for hours! I used it to put in the bottom of my sleeping bag to keep me warm while camping! The teddy bear is super soft and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for pain relief, I switched to a hot water bottle after my heating pads kept dying.
customer_reviews.author: Comimehr

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Both of my daughters love these fluffy covers. Smell do dissipate over time. Very cute and soft. Worth the money. The water bottles themselves last throughout our first winter too. Will look forward for many more seasons of use. Haven't tried with cold/ice water for summer time yet.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Warm friend
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter,2, loves this bear. SHE has approached it as a toy so it was familiar when she needed it for v an ear ache. It is a little on the large side which makes it easy for adult to position for child.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Duck

customer_reviews.title: high quality and cute!
customer_reviews.text: high quality, nice and hot, soothing, and really cute i love the hearts on the feet!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a good old fashioned hot water bottle. The bear cover is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cato

customer_reviews.title: These hot water bottles were absolutely adorable!! They met and exceeded all expectations I ...
customer_reviews.text: These hot water bottles were absolutely adorable!! They met and exceeded all expectations I had! I got them as a present, and they loved it too! I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: rockstardragon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love it so so much. Do not regret buying it. Only problem is he sheds a bit. Fluffs fall off of him all over my blankets but he's still worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: consumer in MI

product_meta.title: HomeTop Premium Classic Rubber Hot or Cold Water Bottle with Cute Stuffed Animal Cover (2 Liter, Purple)
feature_bullets: Package included: 1 Rubber Hot Water Bottle (Approx. Size: 7.5 inch wide x 12.6 inch high), 1 Cute Stuffed Animal Cover (Approx. Size: 9 inch wide x 15 inch high)
This hot water bottle is manufactured to B.S.1970:2012 to ensure maximum safety.
It is made from natural rubber. Retains heat for an extra long time. This lovable hot water bottle & cover will keep you warm for a whole night.
Hot water bottle can be used alone as a remedy for aches, pains and sports injuries. This bottle can also be used for cold purposes, allow easy filling of cold water and crushed ice.
A soft and cuddly stuffed animal cover. Machine Washable. Magic tape closure makes it easy to put on bottle.
